participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and supportive, Emily tends to overthink but is deeply caring and loves to share her interests.
participant_1.background: I got injured while running and had to stop for a few weeks. I have the best dogs in the world and I would brag about them to my friends if I was famous. I overanalyze things and dwell on small mistakes. my brother works at best buy. i live in colorado.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and ambitious, Michael is passionate about his culinary dreams and loves connecting with others over food.
participant_2.background: I'm not rich, but I love technology and I have a sweet tooth. I work out in my home gym to keep fit. I'm moving to a new city to pursue my culinary dreams. i work at a grocery store. i love bruno mars.

content.text: Hey, what are you up to today?
I am working out in my home gym! I am trying to get in shape before I move to a new city next month.
That's awesome! Where are you moving to?
I am moving to Denver, Colorado! I am so excited to start my culinary career there.
That sounds amazing! I live in Colorado too! What kind of culinary career are you looking to pursue?
I want to be a pastry chef! I love working with sweets and I am really good at it.
That's awesome! I am sure you will be great at it! I love sweets too. What are your favorite kind of sweets?
I love chocolate chip cookies and cheesecake! What are your favorites?
I love chocolate chip cookies too! I also love brownies and ice cream.
I love all of those things! We should have a dessert party sometime!
That would be so fun! I would love to have a dessert party with you.
Great! We can plan it for when I move to Colorado
